Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ActionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ActionController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class handles all possible game actions.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionController

      public ActionController()

  • Method Details

    • getMarket

      public java.util.ArrayList<Resources> getMarket​(GameBoard gameBoard, int rowIndex, int colIndex)
      Starts a market action by specifying the row or column the user wants to get.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - Current game.
      rowIndex - Market row index. To obtain a column this must be set to 3.
      colIndex - Column index. If rowIndex == 3 this indicates the column, else this number is not considered
      Returns:
      List of market-obtained resources
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - Exception threw if the player try to do something that he shouldn't be able to do.

    • addFaithPoint

      public void addFaithPoint​(GameBoard gameBoard, HumanPlayer humanPlayer, int number)
      Adds a faith point for player humanPlayer.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - Current game.
      humanPlayer - Player that needs new faith points.
      number - Number of faith points to be added

    • addResourceToWarehouse

      public boolean addResourceToWarehouse​(HumanPlayer humanPlayer, Resources resource, WarehousePositions position, int receivedResourceIndex)
      Adds a resource to the warehouses of a player.
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource to place in the warehouse.
      humanPlayer - Player sorting the warehouse.
      position - Position of the warehouse.
      receivedResourceIndex - Index of the resource to move.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • moveResourceToWarehouse

      public boolean moveResourceToWarehouse​(HumanPlayer humanPlayer, Resources resource, WarehousePositions position, WarehousePositions newPosition)
      Move a resource from position to the newPosition int the warehouses.
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource to move between the warehouses.
      humanPlayer - Player sorting the warehouse.
      position - Starting position of the resource.
      newPosition - New position of the resource.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • payResourceWarehouses

      private void payResourceWarehouses​(HumanPlayer humanPlayer, WarehousePositions position, int[] n)
      Pay the number of resource from the warehouses.
      Parameters:
      humanPlayer - Player sorting the warehouse.
      position - Choose from which warehouse we wanna pay the resources
      n - Resources to pay.

    • discardResource

      public boolean discardResource​(HumanPlayer humanPlayer, int receivedResourceIndex)
      Discard a resource from the temporary storage of a player.
      Parameters:
      humanPlayer - Player sorting the warehouse.
      receivedResourceIndex - Index of the resource to discard.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • shiftWarehouseRows

      public void shiftWarehouseRows​(HumanPlayer player, WarehousePositions startingRow, WarehousePositions newRowPosition)
      Switches warehouse's rows.
      Parameters:
      player - Player moving the warehouse's rows.
      startingRow - Row tha need to be switched.
      newRowPosition - Position that it wants to switch.

    • useBaseProduction

      public boolean useBaseProduction​(HumanPlayer player, int n, Resources output, ExchangeResources exchangeResources)
      Handles the base production of a player board.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player
      n - The number of resources that it wants to pay(1 for the special,2 for the base production)
      output - The resource that the player want.
      exchangeResources - It contains how the player wants to pay the costs of the operation.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • useNormalProduction

      public boolean useNormalProduction​(HumanPlayer player, int index, ExchangeResources exchangeResources)
      Handles the normal production of a player board.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player.
      index - Index of the development card to use.
      exchangeResources - It contains how the player wants to pay the costs of the operation.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • useSpecialProduction

      public boolean useSpecialProduction​(HumanPlayer player, Resources output, int index, ExchangeResources exchangeResources)
      Handles the special production of a player board.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player
      index - Index of the leader cards to use.
      output - The resource that the player want.
      exchangeResources - It contains how the player wants to pay the costs of the operation.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • getProduction

      public boolean getProduction​(Colors color, int level, GameBoard gameBoard, int index, HumanPlayer player, ExchangeResources exchangeResources)
      Handles the buy of a development card from the game board.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player
      index - Index of the production space to use.
      color - Color of the card to buy.
      level - Level of the card to buy.
      gameBoard - Current game board of the game.
      exchangeResources - It contains how the player wants to pay the costs of the operation.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • activateLeader

      public boolean activateLeader​(int index, HumanPlayer player)
      Handles the activation of a leader card.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player
      index - Index of the leader card to activate.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • firstAction

      public boolean firstAction​(int index1, int index2, HumanPlayer player)
      Handles the folding of the two first leader cards.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player
      index1 - Index of the first leader card to discard.
      index2 - Index of the second leader card to discard.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • secondAction

      public boolean secondAction​(java.util.ArrayList<Resources> resources, int indexPlayer, HumanPlayer player)
      Handles the choice of resources that the players need to do before starting the game.The number of resources to choose depends of the player number.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player.
      indexPlayer - Number of the player(0,1,2,3).
      resources - Resources the player chose.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • foldLeader

      public boolean foldLeader​(int index, HumanPlayer player)
      Handles the folding of a leader card.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player
      index - Index of the leader card to fold.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • isResourcesAvailable

      public boolean isResourcesAvailable​(HumanPlayer player, ExchangeResources exchangeResources, boolean buy_use)
      Checks if the player has enough resources to pay with this configuration.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player
      exchangeResources - It contains how the player wants to pay the costs of the operation.
      buy_use - Boolean used to set the message that the player will get if something goes wrong,true for buy,false for use.
      Returns:
      if the operation is successful

    • payResources

      public void payResources​(HumanPlayer player, ExchangeResources exchangeResources)
      Pays the resources from the Strongbox,Warehouse and Special warehouse.
      Parameters:
      player - The current player
      exchangeResources - It contains how the player wants to pay the costs of the operation.
